Bash(# Check for required files and content
echo ""Checking your audit setup...""

# 1. sitemap.xml exists?
if [ -f sitemap.xml ]; then echo ""✔ sitemap.xml found""; else echo ""✖ sitemap.xml MISSING""; fi

# 2. urls.txt exists and has >0 lines?
if [ -s urls.txt ]; then echo ""✔ urls.txt has $(wc -l < urls.txt) URLs""; else echo ""✖ urls.txt is empty or MISSING""; fi

# 3. robots.txt exists?
if [ -f robots.txt ]; then echo ""✔ robots.txt found""; else echo ""✖ robots.txt MISSING""; fi

# 4. posts directory exists and contains .md files?
count=$(ls posts/*.md 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
if [ ""$count"" -gt 0 ]; then echo ""✔ posts/ contains $count markdown files""; else echo ""✖ posts/ is empty or MISSING""; fi

# 5. metadata.xlsx exists?
if [ -f metadata.xlsx ]; then echo ""✔ metadata.xlsx found""; else echo ""✖ metadata.xlsx MISSING""; fi

echo ""Done."")
